column2: "Hey, wait up! Don't rush off like that! We've wandered right into the Corrupted Area."
"...Corrupted Area? That's a good name for this unstable place."
"This must be a feeding ground for the [Profound Darkness]. Food for the [Profound Darkness] grows here. But..."
"...Wait. The [Profound Darkness] didn't resurrect here after all, did it?"

"That would mean... This Corrupted Area has lost its purpose. It's been left in a state of limbo.
...That would explain a few things."
"This is a place that doesn't fit into the rest of the world. A place separated from the normal flow of time."
"You can sense something up ahead, can't you? If you want to investigate, then let's go."
